TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_takuliyaway, title = takuliyaway, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/takuliyaway} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:黃色的) takuliyaway ku banges nu ci imelangay tu atay. .
(kamo no holam:黃色的) takoliyaway ko banges no ci imelangay to atay. .
